channel.title: Avenged sevenfold
channel.description:
can anyone give me a torrent to download the clean version of their newest album? My friend wants it but doesn't have internet access. if anyone can give a torrent link or a download link to the clean album he would be really thankful.
p.s. @moparisthebest, if you could edit the upload options to include .torrent files that would make life a little easier for people to download torrents. just a suggestion.

item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Greeny:

Lies Speljohan, I’m afraid grunting fails. Did you hear that Sppt, Niall etc GRUNTAGE FAILS.

Saying that makes me think suicidal Greeny is suicidal.

item.title: Avenged sevenfold
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:178829”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=239853.msg2035454#msg2035454 date=1202315589]
Lies Speljohan, I’m afraid grunting fails. Did you hear that Sppt, Niall etc GRUNTAGE FAILS.
[/quote]Did i ever say grunting was neccessary to make good music? No. But the fact remains, any band with grunting is 500 times better than hardcore/metalcore. Why? Because all those bands sound exactly the same.[/quote]

agreed…

i don’t like their first album and i don’t like ‘waking the fallen’ very much (their third album) but i like the new one and i like city of evil.

Read full topic

item.title: Avenged sevenfold

item.description:

[quote=“Greeny, post:6, topic:178829”]Lies Speljohan, I’m afraid grunting fails. Did you hear that Sppt, Niall etc GRUNTAGE FAILS.[/quote]Did i ever say grunting was neccessary to make good music? No. But the fact remains, any band with grunting is 500 times better than hardcore/metalcore. Why? Because all those bands sound exactly the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Avenged sevenfold
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Bahahaha. The same? In Waking the Fallen, he still screamed. The two later albums sounded like a wounded pig crying out a death moan.

Read full topic

item.title: Avenged sevenfold
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Silver Lining, post:8, topic:178829”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=239853.msg2035430#msg2035430 date=1202313579]

[quote author=Cryme Time link=topic=239853.msg2035135#msg2035135 date=1202288279]
Lime wire > Burning a cd and tbh it isn’t that good but thats my opinion a7x is the softest band i listen to. i go grindcore and metalcore shit.
[/quote]In my opinion they suck ass along with all metalcore/hardcore bands. Gay pop-singer vocals in the middle of songs and annoying screamo with no solos or technical playing.
[/quote]Eh, the band is certainly unbalanced. At the first, the singer didn’t sound vocally retarded but the guitar parts were mediocre. Now the singer is absolutely terrible and, from what I’ve heard, the guitar parts have improved a bit.[/quote]

more or less yeah… i think the singer sounds the same except for the first album which really sucked. the guitar parts have improved somewhat. i would give the band a 7 of 10

Read full topic

item.title: Avenged sevenfold
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:5, topic:178829”][quote author=Cryme Time link=topic=239853.msg2035135#msg2035135 date=1202288279]
Lime wire > Burning a cd and tbh it isn’t that good but thats my opinion a7x is the softest band i listen to. i go grindcore and metalcore shit.
[/quote]In my opinion they suck ass along with all metalcore/hardcore bands. Gay pop-singer vocals in the middle of songs and annoying screamo with no solos or technical playing.[/quote]Eh, the band is certainly unbalanced. At the first, the singer didn’t sound vocally retarded but the guitar parts were mediocre. Now the singer is absolutely terrible and, from what I’ve heard, the guitar parts have improved a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Avenged sevenfold
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

a7x new album is “avenged sevenfold” by avenged sevenfold. so yeah. they are allright. i like some of their somgs like ‘critical acclaim’ and ‘seize the day’… oh well. idk how he lives but somehow i think it invovles public library computers with dial-up…

school tends to have anti-everything blocked using websense. 2 days ago they had freeonlinegames unblocked, and yesterday they blocked it. kinda sucks…

oh well…

@lordbost, are those clean or not? he can only listen to the clean ones, and i don’t wanna waste hd space for unclean songs he won’t listen too…

Read full topic
